org.xbib.elasticsearch.common.bytes

Class PagedBytesReference

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbib.elasticsearch.common.bytes.PagedBytesReference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BytesReference
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReleasablePagedBytesReference

    public class PagedBytesReference
extends Object
implements BytesReference
    A page based bytes reference, internally holding the bytes in a paged data structure.
